about_me: I'm a software engineer with a focus on web technologies. I strive to create systems that are not only reliable, but also easy to understand and maintain.
site_guide: Here, you'll find an overview of my professional background and experience in the "about_me" section, as well as my resume in the "cv" section. The "portfolio" showcases some of my past projects and the "blog" includes my thoughts and insights on various topics related to my field.
